channel.title: What not to do when writing web browser code [LOL]
channel.description: This isn't a tutorial. More of an anti show off. I have a client that has a website in desperate need of attention (what I'm showing you). He uses over 50 thousand characters in a single file. It doesn't even do much. Really. at one point. there is a line that looks like this: [code]                        [/code] I beg of you, whether you are new to HTML/CSS or are a veteran. NEVER do what's posted above. Use CSS to position where you would like something. Feel free to look at the file he wrote on his own. [I would shoot myself if I ever wrote this, just saying] [url=http://pastebin.com/8cCgW1gK]Click here to see what not to do[/url] If you want to know the general facts: 50828 Characters (I believe this includes all white space) 2141 Lines (Includes white space) 1 file. This should never be done in html. Ever.

item.title: What not to do when writing web browser code [LOL]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

justaguy:

I’ve seen a space entity used appropriately many times, but da love is this.

I’m currently re-writing the website. Lol.
I could link you to the live site, but in fear of advertising, you’d have to request it via pm.

Read full topic
item.source: What not to do when writing web browser code [LOL]

item.title: What not to do when writing web browser code [LOL]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This isn’t a tutorial. More of an anti show off. I have a client that has a website in desperate need of attention (what I’m showing you). He uses over 50 thousand characters in a single file. It doesn’t even do much. Really. at one point. there is a line that looks like this:

                       
I beg of you, whether you are new to HTML/CSS or are a veteran. NEVER do what’s posted above. Use CSS to position where you would like something. Feel free to look at the file he wrote on his own.
[I would shoot myself if I ever wrote this, just saying]
Click here to see what not to do
If you want to know the general facts:
50828 Characters (I believe this includes all white space)
2141 Lines (Includes white space)
1 file.
This should never be done in html. Ever.
